title: 91/91/EEC: Commission Decision of 6 February 1991 on the areas referred to in Article 3 (2) of Council Regulation (EEC) No 2506/88 instituting a Community programme to assist the conversion of shipbuilding areas (Renaval programme) (only the Spanish text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 6 February 1991  on the areas referred to in Article 3 (2) of Council Regulation (EEC) No 2506/88 instituting a Community programme to assist the conversion of shipbuilding areas (Renaval programme)  (Only the Spanish text  is authentic)  (91/91/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 1
The provinces of La CoruĂąa and Pontevedra in the Autonomous Community of Galicia and the province of Vizcaya in the Autonomous Community of the Basque Country satisfy the criteria laid down in Article 3 (1) (a) or (b) of Regulation (EEC) No  2506/88. The Community programme instituted by the said Regulation shall therefore be applicable to these areas.  Article 2
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Spain.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 February 1991. For the Commission
Bruce MILLAN
Member of the Commission   (1) OJ No L 225, 15. 8. 1988, p. 24.
